meanings.definition: Inflammation of the conjunctiva of the eye, causing redness and discharge.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the child with pinkeyes and prescribed eye drops.
meanings.sent2: The pinkeyes made her eyes look red and watery.
meanings.sent3: The pinkeyes in the class spread faster than a rumor.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like pinkeyes beacons in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The pinkeyes were so severe that she had to wear sunglasses indoors.

meanings.definition: A contagious disease of sheep and goats, characterized by inflammation of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: The farmer isolated the sheep with pinkeyes to prevent the spread of the disease.
meanings.sent2: The pinkeyes outbreak among the goats caused concern among the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat blamed the pinkeyes for its inability to see the fence clearly.
meanings.sent4: The pinkeyes in the herd were a glaring sign of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The pinkeyes among the sheep were a stark reminder of the importance of hygiene.
